review_text: Love the display and battery life, steps seem accurate.
Sleep tracking is good but app is a bit confusing.
Bass is amazing, but the ear cups get uncomfortable after long use.
Heart rate seems inaccurate, customer support very slow.
Battery drains quickly and strap quality is poor.
Great sound quality but packaging was damaged.
Cheap build, band broke in two weeks. Not happy.
Steps are not accurate, and no replacement option.
Sound is okay for the price, but connection drops often.
App updates improved performance, very happy now.
Mic quality is average, but music quality is excellent.
Comfortable even after long calls, but case feels cheap.
